description: Sunset rhythms and coastal chill, Bhubaneswar Beach Beats blends Odia melodies with mellow surfside grooves.

items.name: Balighai Beach
items.section_excerpt: Balighai Beach is one of the most peaceful beaches near Bhubaneswar and is known for its serenity and quiet environment. You will not find a beach like this all over Odisha. This beach is id for then who wants the minimal intervention of humans and to spend a vacation in just finding their grounds. The somber nature makes it very easy to attain mental peace and sighting the mental and physical has…
items.description: Balighai Beach is one of the most peaceful beaches near Bhubaneswar and is known for its serenity and quiet environment. You will not find a beach like this all over Odisha. This beach is id for then who wants the minimal intervention of humans and to spend a vacation in just finding their grounds. The somber nature makes it very easy to attain mental peace and sighting the mental and physical hassles. Being a slave for most of the time in your hectic work life makes you very negative. The combination of the unending sea and the sand will rejuvenate you.

items.name: Baliharachandi Beach
items.section_excerpt: Baliharachandi Beach is one of the offbeat beaches near Bhubaneswar among all the beaches. If you want to spend a quieter and offbeat holiday just with your companion and nature then this is the ideal spot. This beach falls between Puri and Konark which makes it a mandatory stoppage for the tourists who commute in between. The tourist takes a brief time to explore this beach. The view of tiny crab…
items.description: Baliharachandi Beach is one of the offbeat beaches near Bhubaneswar among all the beaches. If you want to spend a quieter and offbeat holiday just with your companion and nature then this is the ideal spot. This beach falls between Puri and Konark which makes it a mandatory stoppage for the tourists who commute in between. The tourist takes a brief time to explore this beach. The view of tiny crabs, scattered seashells and an infinite view of the sea makes this a place to attain a great peace.

items.name: Aryapalli Beach
items.section_excerpt: Aryapalli Beach is located at a distance of 105 km from Berhampur and 6 km from Chhatrapur in the Ganjam district of Odisha yet is one of the most popular beaches near Bhubaneswar. The natural attributes of this beach consist of a vivid beautiful flora which in turn consists of lined up palm trees which are seen with a sprinkle of sand on them. This beach provides multiple chores which include sun…
items.description: Aryapalli Beach is located at a distance of 105 km from Berhampur and 6 km from Chhatrapur in the Ganjam district of Odisha yet is one of the most popular beaches near Bhubaneswar. The natural attributes of this beach consist of a vivid beautiful flora which in turn consists of lined up palm trees which are seen with a sprinkle of sand on them. This beach provides multiple chores which include sun-sand and surf.

items.name: Ramachandi Beach
items.section_excerpt: Situated at the merging curve of the Bay of Bengal and vivacious River Kushabhadra, Ramachandi Beach is one of the well known beaches near Bhubaneswar. It is just 7kms from Konark. The construction of marine drive makes it a preferable strolling spot for tourists and regular people. This beach is quite popular among the local people and also to the tourist's due to its accessibility.
items.description: Situated at the merging curve of the Bay of Bengal and vivacious River Kushabhadra, Ramachandi Beach is one of the well known beaches near Bhubaneswar. It is just 7kms from Konark. The construction of marine drive makes it a preferable strolling spot for tourists and regular people. This beach is quite popular among the local people and also to the tourist's due to its accessibility.

items.name: Rushikulya Beach
items.section_excerpt: This is one of the most underrated beaches near Bhubaneswar. This is a tranquil place that provides a unique aura in which you can fully enjoy the vacation. Shedding the hectic life of your busy schedule is important and this place provides that opportunity to regain the stature by which you can look into a positive direction. The hustle-bustle of city-driven life can be left behind if you get her…
items.description: This is one of the most underrated beaches near Bhubaneswar. This is a tranquil place that provides a unique aura in which you can fully enjoy the vacation. Shedding the hectic life of your busy schedule is important and this place provides that opportunity to regain the stature by which you can look into a positive direction. The hustle-bustle of city-driven life can be left behind if you get here.
